sensitivity: ISO 125-1600 ISO 3200, 6400 (available when using Auto mode)
exposurecompensation: -2 EV to +2 EV in increments of 1/3 EV
imagestabilization: Lens shift VR (still pictures) Lens-shift and Electronic VR (movies)
batterylife: Still pictures: Approx. 170 shots Movies (actual battery life for recording)*: Approx. 35 min (1080/30p)
continuousdrive: Up to 7 shots at approx. 9.4 frames per second
selftimer: Can be selected from 10 or 2 seconds duration
movierecording: Full HD: 1920x1080p / 30fps Full HD: 1920x1080/ 25p Full HD: 1920x1080 / 60i Full HD: 1920x1080/ 50i HD: 1280x720p / 30fps HD: 1280x720/ 25p HS 1920x1080 / 15fps HS 1280x720 / 60fps HS 640x480 / 120fps iFrame 720/30p iFrame 720/25p VGA 640x480/ 30p VGA 640x480/ 25p
focallength: 4.5-54.0mm (angle of view equivalent to that of 25-300 mm lens in 35mm [135] format)
focusareapoint: Center Face priority Manual with 99 focus areas Subject tracking Target Finding AF
scenemodes: Back Light Beach Black and White Copy Close Up Dusk/Dawn Easy Panorama Fireworks Show Food Museum Night Landscape Night Portrait Party/Indoor Pet Portrait Portrait Snow Sports Sunset
meteringsystem: Matrix Center-weighted (digital zoom less than 2x) Spot (digital zoom 2X or more)
movieformat: MOV (Video: MPEG-4 AVC/H.264, Audio: LPCM stereo)
flashcontrol: TTL auto flash with monitor preflashes
shutterspeed: 1/2000-1 sec. 4 sec. (when scene mode is set to Fireworks show)
normalfocusrange: [W]: Approx. 1 ft. 8 in. (50 cm.) to infinity [T]: Approx. 5 ft. (1.5 m.) to infinity
